title: How Russia Put Its Future at Risk by Remaking Its Economy for War
summary_full: About half of the country’s federal budget goes toward the fight in Ukraine, money that does little to support its long-term development.
summary_public: About half of the country’s federal budget goes toward the fight in Ukraine, money that does little to support its long-term development.
